website_summaries.verdict: A manual ice crusher with a large storage capacity, though you'll have to put a little muscle into turning the crank.
pros: Easy to clean out after use
Crushes ice finely after just a few minutes
cons: The hand crank requires a little bit of force, but most users should still be able to handle it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a small crank ice crusher. It crushes a lot of ice shaving quick from your ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: cjhlp

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great!!! It's SO easy to use and crushes ice really finely and easily. I made snow cones for my friends with it and they loved them. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Stiel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to try this out! It was easy to use and worked great! My kids are now using it to crush their ice for anything liquid! Compact easy to store easy to clean and easy to use! Highly recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Zelda K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Glad that I bought it. Looking forward to mint juleps this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Traina

customer_reviews.title: I love how fast this came
customer_reviews.text: I was always looking forward to having an ice crusher, and now I can finally make slushies and sorbets at home! I love how fast this came, excited to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Y.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as advertised and works really well. Very easy to use. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mixed drinks and snow cones!
customer_reviews.text: great gadget! My kids are loving this for snow cones and slushies! And the adults are enjoying Margaritas!! works well and easy to use! And sleek looking too!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Fun kid treat
customer_reviews.text: This cute little ice crusher is perfect for a slush-making activity with the kids. It doesn't make large quantities or work very quickly, so its more of a family activity than a party item. With 100% fruit juice its a perfect healthy alternative for a frozen treat!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says, could be better
customer_reviews.text: This item works on regular ice cubes and for the most part shaves the ice (it does not crush the ice) as it says. Chips of ice do end up mixed in with the shaved ice as a result of the cubes being shaved down small enough to fall through the blades. Making larger blocks of ice that fit the "D" shaped opening reduces the chips significantly. It would be nice if the unit, especially the crank arm and handle, were sturdier. There's a lot of flex in the arm and the handle comes loose easily. Given the price it's understandable, though.
customer_reviews.author: davel

customer_reviews.title: Crank Handle is fragile
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, but no doubt the crank handle is the weak point of the device and extra (unnessary) care needs to be taken so it doesn’t break off.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L.

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This thing is not good. It leaves huge chunks of ice mixed in with your "shaved" ice..that is moderately crushed at best..and just a sludgy mess at worst. I gave it a few chances, even trying Sonic-style ice..still, not awesome. I got it for halo-halo, and now it is just at the back of that weird cabinet we all have above our fridge. It's easy to clean though! Especially if you never use it..
customer_reviews.author: Tumor Named Marla

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to keep me from driving every afternoon to get a diet fountain drink ans my dieting treat for the day!! I love the crushed ice at the nearby gas station. I was hoping to replicate that at home. This thing is definitely an ice shaver and not a crusher!! So I now have a new treat at home!! Diet cola "icee"!! It is great!! It seems solid and well made and I hope it lasts a long time. It's also easy to clean and takes little space on the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Tired of all the whining

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart haven't even had it 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: What the heck, second product I have purchased and it broke I was just using it to crush my ice and the gray tip broke off, now what. I expect Goumia can make it right
customer_reviews.author: Liz Roberg

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions included with the product, but I think I figured it out. I used drink and cooler ice bought from the market and it was a hugh failure. You have to press down really hard on the plunger while cranking the handle and the amount of ice resulting from the effort is negligible; also there were shards of ice in the shaved ice. Maybe a different size or shape of ice might work better, but I'm tossing this in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley J. Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife. She has been trying to make diet Popsicle's at home with crystal light and diet root beer. This didn't turn out to well so she had been trying to grind them into a diet slushy using a vegetable chopper. She loves this product. It shaved the ice to a nice consistency and was able to make enough for four servings. Clean up was easy. Cant wait til summer and we can make frozen drinks for pool side.
customer_reviews.author: LT JT R

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Trash
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke after about 4 uses. This is a joke of a product. The design is awful (the bottom part has no means of attaching to the top part, gravity is the only thing holding the two parts together).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ice shaver
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use I just got it last Thursday we already use it 4 times I'm very happy with this product .also easy for kids to use, is fun for them they want to make some everyday ..we made mangoneada and tamarind for are ice shave sooo goood!!.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, for crushing ice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, for crushing ice, and I think it will do well during the summer outings making snow cones for the children. The only downfall I see is the wear and tear. The handle feels like it will pop off or break, and I have only used it 4 times. When it does break, I will more than likely purchase a new one that is more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPER BUT HARDER ON THE WRISTS
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't buy this as a gift because most people won't want to work this hard to make shaved ice. I like this product as a back up to my other "electric Hawaiian ice shaver". This hand crank product also produces a better grade of shaved ice, it's not as smooth-snowy as the electric "Hawiian Ice shaver.
customer_reviews.author: PINKY

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one month
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this while it lasted. I used it about once a day. Within a month the handle broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bee

customer_reviews.title: Durable, space saver, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my elderly mom after the dentist said she was cracking her teeth chewing ice and we did not have a maker. Our kitchen is tiny and counter space is a premium so this really fit the bill. It is very easy to cleans an operate - crushes the ice perfect. The blades are steel so it is durable and they have a cup to push the ice down through with so fingers are safe. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R. mt

customer_reviews.title: Great and works well
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We've been using this almost daily for a few weeks. Works really well, but gives you a nice arm workout! The ice is shaved pretty well with a few random small chunks mixed in (about half the size of a marble). Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Republic84

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. Although I think I ordered the wrong ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Although I think I ordered the wrong product. I was looking for an ice crusher not shaver. That's on me. Still I do like it. I plan on keeping. And it arrived two days later, the exact time I needed them for a party I was hosting. Good job.
customer_reviews.author: JohnFrancisX

customer_reviews.title: VERY AFFORDABLE! DECENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ice crusher for my mom because she loves to eat snow cone ice! It is very easy to use and very affordable. It's small enough to be convenient for storage purposes while still being big enough to hold quite a bit of ice. The only con would be that it is a manual ice crusher so you do have to stand there and grind up all the ice yourself but the good part of this is that the blades are so sharp that it doesn't take a long time at all to get a decent amount of ice going. My mom loves it! Overall I definitely think it's a good purchase and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Have used several times and shaves ice thoroughly. Handle is easy to turn, but takes at least a minute to get enough for one cup. I wouldn't want to make several snow cones in a row with it. I found it works faster when the ice cubes have been run under water first.
customer_reviews.author: Banks5075

customer_reviews.title: Great for crushing ice and doesnt rust
customer_reviews.text: All previous Ice Crushers Ive had in the past have quickly become rusty. This one is more of a Ice shaver but does a good job of crushing too. Its ideal for making crushed ice for cocktails and of course without the rust!
customer_reviews.author: Paul_Frog

customer_reviews.title: Gourmia GIC9635 Ice Shaver - Manual Hand Crank..
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would actually chop up the ice. Boy was I wrong. Pulverizes the ice for Slushies and snow cones. Will use ice chopper for mixed drinks. Product does work well. Don't know how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff  D. NewYork

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ICE CRUSHER!
customer_reviews.text: Finally able to make snow-cone type ice! After the polar vortex cold last week, I tried this machine yesterday. I was using a dark chocolate shake mix from OPTAVIA and it tasted so good as my fueling after dinner of salmon and broccoli.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good for drinks.
customer_reviews.text: Works reasonably well; not fine enough to make a good snowcone though. The "Gourmia" logo smudges in warm weather. Probably wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tenka Digi

customer_reviews.title: It only lasted from May to July.
customer_reviews.text: It crushed ice pretty good and depending on how fast you cranked it. Well yesterday the handle broke. I can still turn the arm but not as fast. Will have to get another kind when I get paid. I got it in May, ordered May 9th and it broke on July 12th.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with crushed ice so this machine is perfect. It mills the ice finely but not fine enough to make snow cones with. It’s like an extreme crushed ice
customer_reviews.author: Meghann Long

customer_reviews.title: Gourmia GIC9635 Ice Shaver – Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I should have measured the size of the product....a little small for me... other than that the product worked as advertised. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J M LALIK SR

customer_reviews.title: Great Little device for shaved ice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item, I am very happy I bought It for my home Tiki Bar. The one and only "concern" is the crank handle seems to strike me with " I am not the sturdiest crank on the planet"....so be careful with me. The device has worked just fine, no issues yet. I would buy again , its cheap easy , and does the job quickly.
customer_reviews.author: charles lubitz

customer_reviews.title: It works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I had a children's event over the weekend. They loved getting the snowballs. It was so easy to work that I had children assisting me to serve up the shaved ice from this powerful little unit. I would recommend for small servings.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Quick shaved ice
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this!!! It was easy to use and quick. Plus I love that I don't have to worry about plugging it in and I can take it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: It does not crush ice It only makes snow.
customer_reviews.text: It says ice crusher, but all it does is make snow and it takes literally forever just to do a couple of few.
customer_reviews.author: AscendingSpirit

customer_reviews.title: Does work .
customer_reviews.text: It works but takes alote effort to get ur ice crushed.wears ur arm out in short periode time .If u have alote drinks to make not the best idea but will work if u have the strength and alote time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Carter

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The ice crusher has a none slip bottom built in, no need to attach it or turn a lever for a suction cup type thing. It just doesn't move when you use it. You just put several ice cubes in the top and then insert the top piece and push down as you turn the crank. The stainless steel blades do the rest. Perfect for my pina colada. Easy clean up also, much better than using a blender cause the ice cubes just jump around and don't really get shredded. I think I'll have another drink!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Norris

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let's just say I should have listened to the reviews! This thing is cheap it's and worthless!!! I'm sending mine back!
customer_reviews.author: pavalkado

customer_reviews.title: Need a different kind
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite... sent it back. It made snow cone ice... not small chunks for frozen drinks..
customer_reviews.author: Ann F. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, no electricity needed so you can take it outdoor. Great for desserts and drinks.
customer_reviews.author: KittyKatNY

customer_reviews.title: Recently bought this so we could enjoy Pat-bing-su (팥빙수) at an out door picnic with no ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this so we could enjoy Pat-bing-su (팥빙수) at an out door picnic with no electricity access. It makes great fluffy, powdery shaved ice and every one enjoyed this Korean summer favorite!
customer_reviews.author: VanityKiller

customer_reviews.title: Simple and satisfying
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what I wanted it to do!! Some small chunks get through with the ice shavings but overall I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya R.

customer_reviews.title: works as described
customer_reviews.text: product works as described however I wish i had looked a little closer to description. I would like the ice to be a little more chunkier than it is. the picture on the box is a little misleading but the description does say "Ice Shaver" so it's my fault. The ice almost turns to mush immediately
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: on time
customer_reviews.text: didn't crush all the ice to small bits, some pieces just got cut in half, still to big for children
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works as should, does not make snow cone ice
customer_reviews.text: The reason I give this product a 4 star is because the ice doesn't come out as small as I like it.
customer_reviews.author: yay

customer_reviews.title: ICE SHAVER WORKS AS DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: The product is very easy to use and does the job for which it is intended - to provide shaved (crushed ice) for drinks. I was, however, surprised that I could not find it listed on your website as one of your products. When I searched for ice crusher or ice shaver, the response was "no results found".
customer_reviews.author: Kygirl1942

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. I bought it for my dad as a gift because he loves crushed ice and I thought this would be a fun/easy way to get that. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Compact
customer_reviews.text: Works great! A little hard to dry, suggest storing inna way that allows airflow
customer_reviews.author: xinnamongirl

customer_reviews.title: Only chops two ice cubes at a time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and lightweight but one can only add 2 cubes at a time because of limited upper space.
customer_reviews.author: Barbpeyt

customer_reviews.title: Not good for seniors with arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I wished I would of bought the electric one. This one is a hand crank and people with arthritis will be uncomfortable since you have to push the ice down while using the crank in the other hand
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne r

customer_reviews.title: Ice-munching addict lol
customer_reviews.text: Great for someone who lives alone in Florida. Make slushies on a college budget hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Gernaey

customer_reviews.title: Geat ice crusher!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to crank and crush ice, but is a little hard for somebody with an injured arm to hold down the lid. Need to be gentle turning the crank because it does seem like it might break with rough usage. Makes ice like snow cone size ice - just what I was looking for! I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Debi B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Snow Cones!!!
customer_reviews.text: Now that the heat is unfortunately here, this is the PERFECT little machine to make snow cones!! Very easy to use and the size is great! Makes a lotta ice!! Happy purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaved Ice
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once. Makes shaved ice, but not crushed. The handle seems a bit flimsy, but my test drive was fine and it produced finely shredded ice. I prefer shaved ice over crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: Ice shavings, not chunks.
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job shaving ice. I thought it would also break up the ice in smaller chunks. It doesn't. And, you have to push down with force to get the ice to shave.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Needed to read description more carefully
customer_reviews.text: I should have read description better, as I wanted ice chips, not shaved. If you wanted shaved ice it just what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Lee Otterstein

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Works great. Makes perfect snow cone type ice.
customer_reviews.author: Eyesofjade

customer_reviews.title: Slow to shave ice.
customer_reviews.text: This device gives me a check of a workout. Slow to shave ice.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 99 year old father to put ice chips in his mouth (he's bedridden) but the word "shaver" is exactly what it is. So I use it for slushies.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Works as described no issues with it yet works good handle seems a little flimsy but others then that not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily after repeated use
customer_reviews.text: easy access to fine ice for patients and myself, but now handle has broken after 5 months of uss

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for elderly . Electric is much better.
customer_reviews.text: It did not meet my expectation, not easy to operate has to push it too hard the cover in order to grind the ice. For elderly like me I am not recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: thelma moore

customer_reviews.title: isn't it cool?
customer_reviews.text: I used this at beach me and my friends had strawberry shaved ice at the beach,,,,, isn't it cool?

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Your really just spinning your wheels..... you may get a small bit of shaved ice in the bottom, but not much

customer_reviews.title: Tough little machine, resulting ice a little softer than sno-cone ice.
customer_reviews.text: So far this works very well after about 6 uses. It takes a little more effort than I expected from product reviews. Tough little machine. Ice is similar to but a little softer than sno-cone ice.

customer_reviews.title: Manual Ice shaver
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as described and no problems. Works just fine for small or one or two glasses. Easy to crank and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Just get an automatic one
customer_reviews.text: Why in the world would you buy a manual ice shaver? I don't know why I did. Too much of a workout for me. Just get an automatic one and save your time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Grandkids like the shaved ice glad I bought the unit.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It was good product I was just kinda needing more of the snow shaven ice vs the shards of ice . But it is a good product.

customer_reviews.title: too hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Takes too long to make a teaspoon of shaved ice would not buy again

customer_reviews.title: Definitely crushes ice
customer_reviews.text: Product was as expected. I rather had a bit larger crush. This is almost a powder but I guess I didn't read description well. Otherwise I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Evans

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well! However, the ice was not shaved like how the "Raspado Guy" does it hahaha. This ice shaver shaves ice in more of a flat shape. It works well I just had a different shave shape in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Guzman

customer_reviews.title: ... used it a handful of times but it is perfect for making smoothies and daquiris
customer_reviews.text: I only used it a handful of times but it is perfect for making smoothies and daquiris.

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and affordable. I bought two, one for me and one for my mother.

customer_reviews.title: No damage  to mom's teeth
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for mom,cause she loves to eat ice I was afraid she might damage her teeth ,so this was a great gift for her.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: For our use, it's a very good product. We used this item to make ice chips for snow cones.

customer_reviews.text: Works great for small batches. It is very easy to use.

customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t what I thought it was going to be. I returned it. Not worth the time.

customer_reviews.text: The product shaves ice like a champ. Very easy to operate.

product_meta.title: Gourmia GIC9635 Ice Shaver – Manual Hand Crank Operated Ice Breaker with Stainless Steel Blades for Fast Crushing – BPA Free
product_meta.description:
Turn your ice cubes into perfectly crushed cool dust that you can place into your soda and cocktails for fancy cooling effect. With Gourmia's Ice Crusher you can conveniently have perfectly shaved ice for all beverages, meals, and treats!

PRODUCT FEATURES

 Silky Smooth Operation
Ergonomic Crank Handle for Comfortable Grip and Rotation
Durable Stainless Steel Blades
Lightweight and Portable for Parties, Festivals, and Picnics
BPA Free

MAKE ICE THAT'S COOLER THAN ICE

For cool looking ice buckets, wonderful seafood platters, or just a nice after-dinner snow cone, shaved ice is always more appealing than cubed ice both functionally and aesthetically. With our Ice Crusher, you will be creating lovely displays of food and beverages at your fancy dinner party for all your guests to enjoy.

UNIVERSALLY ACCEPTED MECHANISM

Without the need of fancy electronics, confusing settings, and a whole panel of buttons to push, our Ice Crusher is a single, one-motion, manually operated ice disintegrator that everyone can use! Simple place ice in the mouth of the crusher and turn the lovely, ergonomic crank! With less strain on your wrist and no trickery, everyone can grow accustomed to using this device for any occasion. Great for summer outings to cool off at the beach or just a nice indoors get together with friends and family.

Introduce your home with Gourmia's Ice Crusher and make the effects of cooling even faster, easier, and better!
feature_bullets: PERFECT ICE MADE EASY: For any drink, cocktail, smoothie, wine bucket, seafood platter, you name it – our ice crusher delivers you with perfectly crushed ice every time.
EFFORTLESSLY PORTABLE: The ideal tool to bring with you to parties and celebrations to create great looking drinks! A great tool for bartenders and drink servers at restaurants.
STRESS-FREE OPERATION: With a simple crank of the handle, you’ve got yourself perfectly crushed ice without the need of confusing settings or various buttons to press.
STAINLESS STEEL BLADES: The blades are made from durable, high quality stainless steel material that will break ice without bending for strong and fast crushing action.
GREAT FOR SERVING: When the ice is crushed, just place leave it in the crusher and use it as a serving bowl or ice bucket for ice so your guests can freely grab ice for their drinks!
